name: Bandung All Time Favorites Delicacies
description: These are things that you should be focusing when you visit Bandung: Shopping, Nature, Culture, History, Nightlife and FOOD! In this one day tour, we will be visiting all time favorite restaurants that has been serving its delicacies over years. For breakfast, we will visit the legendary Oxtail Soup "Dapur Dahapati", a restaurant set in a classic Dutch house. After having breakfast, we will continue to visit "Rumah Mode - factory outlet" to relax your tummy before having lunch.
